name: blackjack.highrollers
command:
const { getProfile } = IRC.require('blackjack.game')

let rollers = store
    .all()
    .map( item => getProfile( item.key))
    .sort( (a, b) => (b.balance-b.favours*1000)-(a.balance-a.favours*1000))
    .map( profile => `{o}${IRC.breakHighlight(profile.name)}{/}: {g}Â¤${profile.balance}{/}, {y}${profile.favours}{/} favour${profile.favours===1?'':'s'}.`)
    .join(' ')
    
print( rollers)
